1268520.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night TP127: Fantastic Foes
1268520.description:
Devin Night TP127: Fantastic Foes

TP127 Fantastic Foes, This pack contains 42 hand-drawn and colored tokens of a variety of monsters and creatures. Suitable for most fantasy settings.
This product includes:
  • Blonde Man
  • Blue Skinned Man
  • Boss Demon
  • Brunette Woman
  • Clockwork Drake
  • Clockwork Soldier
  • Djin
  • 2 Dragon Asian
  • Fairy
  • Giant
  • 2 Griffin Knight
  • Gun Snail
  • 2 Hydra Cave
  • Male Bugbear Fighter
  • Male Dragon Lord
  • Male Fairy Adventurer
  • Male Leprechaun
  • Male Merman Youth
  • Machine
  • Male Lunatic
  • 2 Man bust
  • Manticore
  • Mummy Swordsman
  • Valyrie
  • Winged Wolf
  • Woman Bust
  • 3 Worm Desert
  • 3 Worm Ice
  • 3 Worm Jungle
  • 3 Worm Lava
Converted by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
